concept.title: Create Surfaces
concept.shortdesc: 3D meshes use planar embedded surfaces as its surface. Defined fromthe vertexposition of initial mesh network-axis and secondary network-axis (the direction of M and N), in which Vertex of initial mesh network-axis points to the M direction, and N direction points to secondary network-axis. Similar to the function of X and Yaxis on XYplane, M and N are designated individually to the vertexposition of row and column, Meshes are available both in 2D and 3D spaces, mainly used in 3D spaces.

conbody.p: Meshes can help solving the problemof using features like hiding, shade and render other than physical properties (weight, quality, the center of gravity) that is unavailable in using wireframe. You can also create irregular geometric drawings with meshes, such as a 3D topographical model of mountainous terrain.

Various methods are used for creating a mesh, both using keyboard way to specify mesh parameter or operating 3D command to draw the planar mesh, the size of M and N of a mesh determines the number of lines drawn on each direction.
